SiegeEngineType.name: {=8zqqDTbp}Braziers
SiegeEngineType.description: {=nQPLbUa6}Siege Braziers and additional material allow archers to light their arrows on fire

SiegeEngineType.name: {=86793831}100-mon Ōztustu
SiegeEngineType.description: {=uPDOEMCR}Ōzutsu, literally "a large caliber" is a term designating a large matchlock gun. The Japanese people record various terms designating guns; Kakae Ōzutsu (holding-up hand Cannon), Kuni Kuzushi (Kingdom Demolisher), and so on. This type of ōzutsu can shoot roughly 50-100 momme (188-375 grams, or 0.4-0.8 lbs) balls.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=U53M9G9W}Naval Cannon
SiegeEngineType.description: {=2pSICaQU}Naval Cannons are rare, and take time to set up, but are devistating to fortifications

SiegeEngineType.name: {=yVf1b2wm}Tate Shields
SiegeEngineType.description: {=7NqA9UJd}Tate shields provide defenses for ranged units

SiegeEngineType.name: {=Gc0UxEgr}Ammunition Cache
SiegeEngineType.description: {=GzRqki8Q}Ammunition Cache provides a resuply point for archers and gunners
